channel.title: Pages on SRE France
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on SRE France

item.title: Job Board
item.author: srefranceasso@gmail.com (SRE France Association)
item.description:
This space is opened to everyone who wants to share job opportunites that could be useful for SREs looking for new challenges.

Here’s a curated list of sites where you can find new jobs opportunities.

Boards

  • Welcome to the Jungle welcometothejungle.co/fr/jobs
  • Remote Ok remoteok.io

Companies

  • Botify jobs.botify.com
  • bsport careers.bsport.io
  • Grafana Labs job-boards.greenhouse.io/grafanalabs
  • Mirakl Labs labs.mirakl.jobs
  • DataDome welcometothejungle.com/fr/companies/datadome/jobs
  • Le Bon Coin Recrutement leboncoin.fr
  • Datadog Engineering careers.datadoghq.com/engineering
  • Criteo Labs criteo.com/careers
  • Polyconseil welcometothejungle.co/fr/companies/polyconseil/jobs

item.title: About
item.author: srefranceasso@gmail.com (SRE France Association)
item.description:
